readable.title: 3426724811_137855b4f7
readable.content: A group of people in hazmat suits are standing with a dummy on a stretcher . People wearing suits practicing a rescue in a dangerous environment . several men in biohazard suits carrying a human looking doll on a rolling bed Several men in protective suits are rolling a man on a gurnee . There is a man on a stretcher surrounded by men in hazmat suits .
